name: ORS Health and Social Care Alerts and Care Needs Report
description:
The report returns a list of Prisoners who have active medical and social care alerts as well as those prisoners who have on-going Personal Care Needs
PDD0227 v1.0 Last Modified: 28/03/2022

dataset.name: Alerts
dataset.query: DP11_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_TYPE AS CARE_TYPE, AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.START_DATE AS CARE_FROM_DATE, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION AS ESTABLISHMENT_NAME, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_HEALTH_PROBLEMS AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DOMAIN = 'HEALTH_PBLM') AND (AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_CODE = AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.CODE) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID <> 'ZZGHI' AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_STATUS = 'ON' AND NOT AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DESCRIPTION IN ('No Disability', 'No Disability Recorded', 'Refusal to Disclose', 'Refused to Disclose') AND AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_TYPE <> 'BSCAN')), dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.EXPIRY_DATE, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.RELEASE_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.RELEASE_DATE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.RELEASE_DATE IS NULL THEN DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE.LAST_REL_DATE ELSE NULL END AS CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION AS ESTABLISHMENT_NAME, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.COMMENT_TEXT, DP11_.CARE_TYPE, DP11_.CARE_FROM_DATE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_ALERTS AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS, (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.APD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.APD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE ELSE NULL END AS Last_Rel_Date, EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID = (SELECT MAX(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID)) DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, DP11_ WHERE ((AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.CODE = AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN = 'ALERT_CODE' OR AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID <> 'ZZGHI' AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_STATUS = 'ACTIVE') AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_TYPE = 'M' OR AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE IN ('TM', 'AS', 'ADSC')))) AND (DP11_.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, DESCRIPTION, ALERT_DATE, EXPIRY_DATE, CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE, ESTABLISHMENT_NAME, AGY_LOC_ID, COMMENT_TEXT, V_ALERT_EFFECTIVE_DATE AS V_ALERT_EFFECTIVE_DATE_DISPLAY, EXPIRY_DATE AS V_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE, DESCRIPTION AS V_ALERT_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN CARE_TYPE = 'PHY' THEN 'Medical' ELSE CASE WHEN CARE_TYPE = 'PSYCH' THEN 'Psychological' ELSE CASE WHEN CARE_TYPE = 'DISAB' THEN 'Disability' ELSE CASE WHEN CARE_TYPE = 'MATSTAT' THEN 'Maternity' ELSE CASE WHEN CARE_TYPE = 'SC' THEN 'Social Care' ELSE CARE_TYPE END END END END END AS CARE_TYPE_DESCRIPTIONS, V_CARE_SUB_TYPE AS V_CARE_SUB_TYPE_DISPLAY, CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE AS V_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE, CARE_FROM_DATE AS V_CARE_FROM_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Personal Care Needs (5)
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_TYPE, AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.START_DATE, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION AS ESTABLISHMENT_NAME, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_HEALTH_PROBLEMS AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DOMAIN = 'HEALTH_PBLM') AND (AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_CODE = AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.CODE) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID <> 'ZZGHI' AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_STATUS = 'ON' AND NOT AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DESCRIPTION IN ('No Disability', 'No Disability Recorded', 'Refusal to Disclose', 'Refused to Disclose') AND AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_TYPE <> 'BSCAN')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, FIRST_NAME, PROBLEM_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, START_DATE, ESTABLISHMENT_NAME, AGY_LOC_ID FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:CARE_TYPE_DESCRIPTIONS
field.legacySql: =If([Care Type] = "PHY"; "Medical"; If([Care Type] = "PSYCH"; "Psychological"; If([Care Type] = "DISAB"; "Disability"; If([Care Type] = "MATSTAT"; "Maternity"; If([Care Type] = "SC"; "Social Care";[Care Type])))))

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_CARE_SUB_TYPE NOT(IN ('No Disability Recorded','No Disability','Refusal to Disclose','Refused to Disclose')))

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_CARE_SUB_TYPE NOT(IN ('No Disability Recorded','No Disability','Refusal to Disclose','Refused to Disclose')))

filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_CARE_SUB_TYPE NOT(IN ('No Disability Recorded','No Disability','Refusal to Disclose','Refused to Disclose')))

filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_CARE_SUB_TYPE NOT(IN ('No Disability Recorded','No Disability','Refusal to Disclose','Refused to Disclose')))

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_CARE_SUB_TYPE NOT(IN ('No Disability Recorded','No Disability','Refusal to Disclose','Refused to Disclose')))
